name: Promaster Sea Automatic Black Dial Men's Watch
description: Silver-tone stainless steel case with a black rubber strap. Silver-tone stainless steel bezel. Black dial with luminous white hands and dots-dots hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Day of the week and date display at the 3 o'clock position. Automatic movement with a 45-hour power reserve. Scratch resistant mineral crystal. Screw down crown. Solid case back. Round case shape, case size: 42 mm, case thickness: 12 mm. Band width: 20 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 200 meters / 660 feet

name: Chemin Des Tourelles Automatic Men's Watch
description: Rose gold PVD stainless steel case with a brown leather strap. Fixed rose gold PVD bezel. Silver dial with rose gold-tone alpha-style hands and index hour markers. Roman numerals mark the 3, 6, 9 and 12 o'clock positions. Minute markers around an inner ring. Dial Type: Analog. Date display at the 6 o'clock position. Tissot calibre Powermatic 80 (C07.111) automatic movement, based upon ETA 2824-2, containing 23 Jewels, bitting at 21600 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 80 hours

name: Le Locle Powermatic 80 Automatic Men's Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a black leather strap. Fixed stainless steel bezel. Black dial with grey leaf-style hands and Roman numeral hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Tissot calibre Powermatic 80 (C07.111) automatic movement, based upon ETA 2824-2, containing 23 Jewels, bitting at 21600 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 80 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown.
